basics.name: Calvan Liang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021. I intend to pursue a career in Video Game Design or Multimedia Development.

work.summary: Computer Lab Monitor for the UH Linguistics Building
highlights: Assist students who cannot log into their computer and solve computer related problems

activities.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
activities.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
